product_name: The North Face Echo Lake Dress - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Cover up your bathing suit and head to the beachside cafe in The North Face Echo Lake halter dress. It's made with soft, stretch-knit fabric that dries quickly. QuickDry treatment discourages water absorption and speeds drying time; fabric also offers 50 UPF protection from the sun. Halter neck of this soft, stretchy knit dress can be easily adjusted and tied in place. Silhouette of The North Face Echo Lake dress features slight ruching at the seams and an exposed double-layer hem for a flattering fit. Closeout.
short_description: Cover up your bathing suit and head to the beachside cafe in The North Face Echo Lake halter dress. It's made with soft, stretch-knit fabric that dries quickly.
